name: NSImage.SymbolConfiguration
desc: An object that contains the specific font, style, and weight attributes to apply to a symbol image.

items.name: init(pointSize: CGFloat, weight: NSFont.Weight)
items.desc: Creates a symbol configuration with the specified point size and font weight.

items.name: init(pointSize: CGFloat, weight: NSFont.Weight, scale: NSImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a symbol configuration with the specified point size, font weight, and symbol scale.

items.name: init(textStyle: NSFont.TextStyle)
items.desc: Creates a symbol configuration with the specified text style.

items.name: init(textStyle: NSFont.TextStyle, scale: NSImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a symbol configuration with the specified text style and symbol scale.

items.name: init(scale: NSImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a symbol configuration using the scale you specify.

items.name: struct NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: Constants that specify the preferred text styles you use with fonts.

items.name: enum NSImage.SymbolScale
items.desc: Constants that specify which scale variant of a symbol image to use.

items.name: init(paletteColors: [NSColor])
items.desc: Creates a color configuration by specifying a palette of colors.

items.name: init(hierarchicalColor: NSColor)
items.desc: Creates a hierarchical color configuration using the color you specify.

items.name: class func preferringMulticolor() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a configuration that specifies that the symbol should prefer its multicolor variant if one exists.

items.name: func applying(NSImage.SymbolConfiguration) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a configuration object by applying the values from the configuration you specify.
